Eclipse 3.0 RC3

FYI, I just talked to a co-worker that has this exact problem on Windoze.
This problem is occuring often and is really annoying.  Any chance it could be considered for RC4?

I'm getting it too. No traceback when I double-click the error, but there is a 
traceback in the log file. When I press Copy I get only:

Error Jul 01, 2004 12:26:12.831 Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-
in: "org.eclipse.core.runtime".

My apologies for the inconvenience.  This one slipped through the cracks as it
only affected the very last/only stack trace entries in logs.

Fixed and released to head :)
*** Bug 70018 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

traces.message: Assertion failed:  ContentViewer must have a content provider when input is set.
